name: Exceptional sight
description: Get an advantage on perception check that involve sight.

name: Exceptional hearing
description: Get an advantage on perception check that involve hearing.

name: Exceptional smell
description: Get an advantage on perception check that involve smelling.

name: Exceptional taste
description: Get an advantage on perception check that involve tasting.

name: Exceptional feeling
description: Get an advantage on perception check that involve feeling.

name: Danger instinct
description: Get an advantage on the detection of ambushes. Might also allow perception checks if usually not possible. The character sometimes just has a bad feeling.

name: Frugal
description: The character can exist longer without rations and suffers penalties one day later than others.

name: Gatherer
description: The character double the amount of food for each quality level on a check to gather food.

name: Hunter
description: The character double the amount of food for each quality level on a check to hunt food.

name: Silent steps
description: Checks to detect the character by hearing suffer a disadvantage.

name: Ambush
description: Attacking while the enemy is not aware of the character increases the damage by %d.

name: Lip reading
description: Allows to use the perception skill for the application lip reading.
